actor

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • actor.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animal, Person, Robot

    public abstract class Actor
extends Observable
    Models Actors in worlds. Actors have their own properties and can also go places and carry things.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow
    See Also:
    Thing, Place

      • take

        public void take(Thing t)
        Add an item to inventory of a person. Remove it from the room contents.
        Parameters:

      • drop

        public Thing drop(Thing t)
        Remove item from inventory of person and add it to room inventory.
        Parameters:
        t - Thing to be removed.
        Returns:
        Removed item.
